headline: Wells Fargo Maintains Overweight Rating on Constellation Energy Corp. (CEG)
summary: Constellation Energy Corp. (NASDAQ:CEG) is included among the 12 Best Nuclear Energy Stocks to Buy Now On January 20, 2026, Wells Fargo analyst Shahriar Pourreza lowered the firm’s price target on Constellation Energy Corp. (NASDAQ:CEG) to $460 from $478 while still maintaining an Overweight rating. The firm continues to highlight the stock as its Best […]
